title: Climbing as Support in Bronze
body:
Hey guys.
As you can see in the title, I’m one of the few, rare, but LOVED low elo support main climbers.
The thing is, I started off in bronze 4, and after 5 months I’m in bronze 2. It’s a very slow progress to climb as a support, because you’re so TEAM RELIANT.
Anyway, my main question is, is it worth to continue? I’m on a losing streak at the moment, and I’m so pissed. I mean, in one of my recent games, I asked if my Ashe could focus more on farm cause it was so shitty, and she was like: ”yo the reason I’m 0/5 is because I haven’t played Ashe in like 3 months” as if it was a good excuse in ranked, which made me FUSODKCLDPLEPQÅDKGIGÖDLRJEPWPROOGPFÖD.
After that game I was like: bitch I’m quitting cause I’ve wasted 4729293 years to only climb two PATCHES. So I went mid, Taliyah, and I lost which made me tilt so hard. I haven’t played LoL since, and I’m feeling the pressure is lightening. 
So, should I keep grinding in my definitely most experienced role (support) while dealing with shitty teammates (sometimes they’re super good though, sometimes), or should I jump into more impacting roles which I completely suck at (though I could practice in normals)?

replies.body:
From what i see you play mainly enchanter supports.

climbing using enchanter supports in lower elo is going to be frustrating.

If you feel changing roles is the best solution, here's what i want you to try first.

try playing carry support before you take up the idea of role switching, just try that and see how it feels. play things like brand/vel/zyra etc etc. and if they don't go well then try exploring other roles.

Hm... the thing is I heard that carry supports are really good in super low elo, like bronze 4. But in my experience, in bronze 2-1, the supports are getting better, while the adc’s still suck. My point is, you don’t fucking know how crowded these elos are with Leona’s and Blitz’s, who totally counters the likes of Zyra, and other heavy poke/damage supports. The only options against these aggressive supports are... PEEL. That’s why I mostly go enchanter supps like Lulu and Janna, and sometimes Alistar and Taric when we need it. 
Also carry supports are so HATED by adc’s in my elo, while Lulu Janna Alistar are fucking worshipped (idk) xD
But I shall try out Zyra perhaps, I played her alot in season 7 when I was silver 3... (good times)

See here's the argument to the logic you put.

you say the supports slowly get better right? but the adc stays just as bad.


so if the supports got better but they had to restrict themselves to peel/ engage... while your adc continues to chimp out like your ashe did... why not be the carry, have the damage get the kills and gold from your adc being caught, and carry?



The reason adcs worship lulu/janna/raka etc etc is because those champs are "cater to me and bow to me champions" and ali is just a engage beefy meatshield.



Most adcs are egotistical and thats why they don't like carry supports.
